creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
dimension: 54 × 76 3/4 in. (137.2 × 194.9 cm) (length: from neck peak to hem; width: cuff hem to cuff hem)
text: Cloth for this type of ritual Daoist garment is often black, red, green, yellow, or white (the five symbolic colors of the universe), and the embroidered decoration is done in gold metal-wrapped thread. This robe has the “cosmic diagram” on the back and yin-yang symbols in front.
title: Daoist priest’s robe (jiangyi)
